job_title: Project Manager with strong Azure cloud exp

primary: Operations and Application Support project management
all: Operations and Application Support project management

jd: Hello Folks, (Must be strong in Project management, Application support, Azure Cloud, Java, Spring, Microservices, DevOps skills) - Note it AND Prefer TX localHope you all are doing good.Please go through the Job description and let me know your interest. Title: Project Manager with strong Azure cloud expLocation: Frisco, TX (Onsite/ Hyrbid)Duration: 12+ Months contractNote: Project Manager who has application support background in Azure Cloud or Azure PMMandatory Skills: Operations and Application Support project management, Development Project Management, Azure Cloud, Java, Spring Boot Microservices application support, Infrastructure Analysis ; Monitoring, Customer ManagementMust Have Skills –Project Manager – 12+ YearsManaging Azure Based Application – 5+ YearsDevOps- 5+ YearsOperations and Application Support project management- 8+ YearsDevelopment Project Management- 8+ YearsJava, Spring Boot, Microservices – 5+ YearsApplication Support – 5+ YearsInfrastructure Analysis & Monitoring- 5+ YearsCustomer Management- 5+ YearsProject Manager• 12+ years of experience.• Experience in Managing Operations and Support teams for large Azure cloud-based applications• Excellent skill set on analyzing, identifying, troubleshooting and rectifying application/infrastructure issues• Strong knowledge of telemetry & monitoring tools such as Splunk, AppDynamics, Grafana• Own and manage major incidents in production and lower environments as defined by the customers• Strong technical background in Java based applications with proficiency in Microservices, REST APIs and Cloud• Experience in Managing Development/Enhancement projects• Experience in Telecom Domain is a plus• Experience in Managing a team of 25-30 members• Experience in managing IT projects with a strong understanding of ITIL frameworks and best practices• Track and ensure compliance of various metrics – such as SLA, MTTR, MTTA, KPI• Should be able to identify improvement areas, drive automation and transformation initiatives• Collaborate with onshore and offshore teams to ensure application support activities are completed within the SLAs• Communicate project status, issues and risks timely to all stake holders, cross functional teams and managers• Passion to learn and adapt with new technologies as per project needs• Should have worked in client facing roles and have excellent communication skills• Demonstrate strong leadership capabilities by driving decision-making and guiding the team to meet project objectives• Strong knowledge in Agile & Kanban
